desc: Cider and Basil is an Australian Dog Lifestyle Brand, where specially curated products and designs are made for dogs and their humans. Offering gorgeous dog friendly candles, dog friendly grooming products and wholesome delicious pet treats and chews made in Australia . There is something for every dog and their human

layout.text: Your Natural Choice for your Dog
Your dog's coat has never felt this silky,its skin has never been this calm and your house has never smelt this good.
